message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a competitive price of $18,000. This is a limited-time offer, so don't miss out!
Alice, your offer is a bit high for my budget. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $12,000.  Let me know if you're willing to negotiate.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I can't sell the product for less than $15,000. It's a very fair price considering the value it offers. What do you say?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $15,000 is still a bit out of my range.  I'm willing to offer $13,000. This is a fair price considering what I'm willing to pay and your need to sell the product. Let me know what you think.
